2016 gada Rio Olimpiskās spēles. Treka riteņbraukšana
Latin American Hot Borders
programme.desc: Latin American Hot Borders is a documentary series on National Geographic that follows stressful and tough working days of Customs officers. The borders in Latin America separate one country from another and at the same time legal from illegal as well. The viewers will witness a battle against the crime that goes to the extreme. Latin America is in the front line in a war against human trafficking, drugs, weapons and alcohol smuggling, money laundry, illegal immigration. In case this war is lost, the consequences can be terrible for many people.

programme.title: The Border
programme.desc: Three hundred miles of open coastline makes Puerto Rico vulnerable to illegal immigrants and drug traffickers who use the island as a springboard into mainland U.S. In this episode of Border Wars, agents and officers of the Department of Homeland Security in Puerto Rico work around the clock to take down suspected drug dealers inside a violent barrio, dismantle a powerful identity theft ring and intercept a huge cash load headed for the Dominican Republic.

programme.title: Breakout
programme.desc: This is the amazing story of how three men crafted wooden keys to unlock their way out of South Africas secure Pretoria Prison. Set against the backdrop of the notorious period of apartied in South Africa, the three terrorists, Tim Jenkin, Stephen Lee and Alex Moumbaris, considered themselves political prisoners and are determined to escape. They approached this challenge with audacity and ingenuity, making and testing keys fashioned in wood work classes right under the noses of their captors and smuggling these parts around the prison. Over months of trial and error, they unlocked their cells and then tested their keys on each of the ten doors that led to freedom, coming up with clever schemes to avoid patrolling guards. On the day of the escape, they literally walked out, undetected, to freedom and take their cause overseas.

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures
programme.desc: Nazi Megastructures is a documentary TV series, a spinoff of the broader Megastructures TV series. It focuses on Nazi Germany's various military engineering projects during World War II. The series explores the artifacts of the powerful evil empire built to secure world's domination, and reveals dark engineering secrets of iconic Nazi Megastructures. To control nations and conquer the world, Nazi create huge terror machines, superguns and weapons of mass destruction. Take a look at the remains of most impressive megastructures that changed the world forever.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This American anthology period drama series is designed so that in each season the audience is introduced to a different iconic person who made a huge impact to the world and follows their life stories. The first season follows turbulent journey of the physicist who would grow to become the icon- Albert Einstein. Second season returns to explore the turbulent life of the 20th century's most controversial artist, Pablo Picasso and the subject of the third season will be American singer Aretha Franklin, known as "The Queen of Soul". This amazing series will change the way we see this incredible people, portrayed by famous actors, as we follow them through childhood to great discoveries, epic loves, complicated relationships, causes and their flaws.

programme.title: Bloody Tales of Europe
programme.desc: Gravediggers, witches and goat riders are the focus of BLOODY TALES – DARK ARTS where Tudor historian Dr Suzannah Lipscomb and journalist Joe Crowley venture into the unknown. Were the gravediggers of a town called Frankenstein guilty of spreading the plague with powders made from dead corpses? Why was a respectable surgeon accused of being a gang leader of devil worshipping thieves, and how did a small Basque village get caught up in the biggest witch hunt in Spanish history?

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Discover how roasted eggplants are transformed into rich and yummy baba ghanoush; apple strudel is hand braided into a flaky, buttery treat; creamy ranch dressing gets its distinctively tangy flavour; and soft, sweet and chewy chocolate chip cookies are produced in big enough quantities to satisfy the demand for bedtime snacks everywhere. From raw materials to finished products, FOOD FACTORY reveals in awe-inspiring detail how mass-produced favourites are really made. Put on a hardhat and get ready to meet the food!

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: Discover how chocolaty cherry cordial bonbons come packed with explosive flavor in every bite; warm and comforting mulled apple cider is brewed with a mix of special spices to achieve a mouthwatering apple pie aroma; a carefully selected batch of healthy dried beans are combined to create a delicious four-blend medley; and rich and creamy turtle cheesecake is built from the bottom up, resulting in a super-decadent after-dinner treat. From raw materials to finished products, FOOD FACTORY reveals in awe-inspiring detail how mass-produced favourites are really made. Put on a hardhat and get ready to meet the food!

programme.title: Bid & Destroy
programme.desc: Brian, Lee, and the rest of Danley Demolition take down a house in Auburn, NH. Because of the neighborhood that the house is in, they expect a tremendous yield of great items, but the demo on the home is particularly tricky-the three-and-a-half-story chimney and house foundation need to remain intact. The guys find some major pieces of sports memorabilia. The value and the potential for a huge profit come down to the appraisal of Phil, a sports collectibles expert. If they are worth big bucks, the guys can walk away on top.

programme.title: Bid & Destroy
programme.desc: Lee and Brian are taking down an old farmhouse that was acquired by a school to make room for a new parking lot. The house has been abandoned for years and appears to be a time capsule waiting to be discovered. During the hunt they find some amazing things: an old bell; a Model A doodle bug tractor; a strange German typewriter; some old World War II-era items; and a very old locked safe that could be packed with valuables -- if they can get into it without destroying what's inside. However, the Danley team knows that no demolition is easy and this one is no different, especially since they have taken the project at cost in order to beat out another bidder. Brian and Lee are banking on everything going smoothly and finding some big ticket items in order to make even bigger money, but if they don't, they have just made a huge mistake.

programme.title: Filthy Riches
programme.desc: All across the country, American mavericks are working hard for every dollar they earn. On the Delaware River, eel fisherman Ray Turner faces a huge lightning storm as he paddles to his weir. In Oregon, Greg Dahl and Albert DeSilva struggle to remove a 1,500-pound burl from the side of a steep, craggy hill. Across the country in Maine, Jim Campbell and Andy Johns get into a heated battle with two worm diggers who are trying to dig on their turf. And in the woods of Michigan, Chris and Levena are trying to find mushrooms that have not been damaged by recent heavy rains. Everyday is a battle with the elements if you want to make a living off the land.

programme.title: Ultimate Supercar
programme.desc: A must see for petrolheads and connoisseurs, this series takes the viewer behind the scenes at some of the most legendary automobile manufacturers on the planet to reveal how their supercars are designed, engineered and constructed. From the DBS Superleggera of the last truly independent marque, Aston Marton, to Ferrari's best-selling Portofino and from rapper's favourite, the Bentley Continental GT. to the over-the-top Lamborghini Aventador SVJ, we learn what makes these beautiful machines unique and how it is the small, individual engineering secrets that make all the difference and ensure their mythical status and economic success.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw, a car enthusiast and TV presenter teams up with master mechanic Fuzz Townshend to rescue rusty old cars and classic vehicles from their former neglected lives. People can nominate a relative or friend without them knowing if they've been unable to restore the car themselves for any reason from medical issues to financial problems. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: In the late 1960s BMW were looking to break into the US market and the sports saloon they created to make the right waves was the 2002, a 2 litre, 100bhp tourer, it instantly became a successful race car with Hans Stuck winning the Nurburgring 24-hour race in 1970. As a result the 2002 arrived in the states in 1967 to instant success and rapid and highly profitable sales. BMW didn't rest on its laurels, in 1973 they started producing a fuel injected turbo version of the 2002 : the tii. Launched at the 1973 Frankfurt Motor Show it was BMW's, and Europe's, first turbocharged production car, it produced 170 bhp and had a top speed of 115mph and where its predecessor had been a success on the track the tii continued on the World rally Circuit where it went on to win many rallies and hill climbs. In actuality only 1,672 Turbos were ever built, but they achieved BMWs aim of making them a World renowned brand name in a few short years and salvaging the tatters or the BMW distribution network in the US. With its striking "shark nose" front end the 2002 set the style that BMWs were to follow to this day. Very few 2002tiis now exist making them not just a fun car to drive but also a sure fire commodity on the classics market.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: North vs. South
programme.desc: Wicked Tuna: North vs. South is a reality TV series, a spin off of the original series of Wicked Tuna. It is about commercial tuna fishermen from New England who fish for the lucrative Atlantic bluefin tuna off the coast of North Carolina. The teams of fishermen compete with each other to see who can catch the most fish. As a conservation measure there is an overall quota of approximately 200 individual fish. As well there are new techniques and methods how to catch tuna.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This American anthology period drama series is designed so that in each season the audience is introduced to a different iconic person who made a huge impact to the world and follows their life stories. The first season follows turbulent journey of the physicist who would grow to become the icon- Albert Einstein. Second season returns to explore the turbulent life of the 20th century's most controversial artist, Pablo Picasso and the subject of the third season will be American singer Aretha Franklin, known as "The Queen of Soul". This amazing series will change the way we see this incredible people, portrayed by famous actors, as we follow them through childhood to great discoveries, epic loves, complicated relationships, causes and their flaws.

programme.title: Big Fish Texas
programme.desc: At Katie's Seafood Market the quota has increased and so have the problems. Nick now has to work double time to not only sell fish, but to find storage for the influx of snapper coming in. Meanwhile, Hans is out at sea fishing for grouper, but when problems arise he must decide whether to play it safe or risk it all. When Mac reveals that his car is broken down, Buddy takes it upon himself to get it repaired. Buddy has taken a back seat in the day-to-day operations at Katie's, and has left it up to his sons to keep the business a success.

programme.title: Zeb's Big Fish
programme.desc: Fish biologist and conservation expert, Zeb Hogan, travels to Thailand on a mission to uncover why this country is home to so many giant freshwater fish species.12 On the surface this tropical paradise would seem like a fish haven, but trouble is brewing. The conditions in Thailand are so perfect that it is enticing breeders to raise foreign species3, and here they are able to thrive, grow and breed on their own. This could mean trouble for Thailands native fish… and its not the only thing that is causing their decline. To get the answers to his mission Zeb travels across Thailand to identify as many of the countrys monster fish species as possible, both native and foreign, assess their status in the wild and meet the locals who can help these giants survive, but at what cost?

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: In 1993 Brendan Cosso was partying and mixing with celebrities in Hollywood. He didn't need the money. But when the offer came to smuggle cocaine out of Brazil for $50,000, he took it. He was arrested with three friends at Sao Paulo airport. Thanks to the efforts of his father in securing a top criminal lawyer, Brendan received a sentence of four years rather than the 25 demanded by the prosecution. But he was sent to Carandiru prison, the most violent prison in South America, where a year previously 111 prisoners had been massacred.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Military veteran Kim Hood needs a break from life, so she joins a friend on a trip to Thailand to procure nail products for her new business. Hours before their return flight home, the true nature of the trip is finally exposed when the products delivered are not nail supplies but heroin. Actor Erik Aude is on the brink of stardom, but almost famous doesn't pay the bills. A friend offers him a free trip to Turkey and $800 to bring back leather goods. When the trip goes smoothly, Erik takes a similar trip to Pakistan. But this time, authorities discover opium in the lining of Erik's suitcase; a crime he didn't know he was committing.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This American anthology period drama series is designed so that in each season the audience is introduced to a different iconic person who made a huge impact to the world and follows their life stories. The first season follows turbulent journey of the physicist who would grow to become the icon- Albert Einstein. Second season returns to explore the turbulent life of the 20th century's most controversial artist, Pablo Picasso and the subject of the third season will be American singer Aretha Franklin, known as "The Queen of Soul". This amazing series will change the way we see this incredible people, portrayed by famous actors, as we follow them through childhood to great discoveries, epic loves, complicated relationships, causes and their flaws.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: Europe from Above takes to the air over Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, Spain and the UK to showcase Europe's finest cultural and geographical landmarks as you've never seen them before. Stunning aerial hyper-lapse photography allows us to visualise the changes of a season in seconds, as tulip fields in the Netherlands magically burst into colour and waterfalls in the Dolomites turn to ice. We reveal how tradition, engineering and natural wonders have shaped this epic continent – a vibrant portrait of these regions and the people who keep their traditions alive.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: From raw materials to finished products, Food Factory goes behind the scenes to reveal how our favorite foods are produced: It takes 240,000 hardworking bees to produce just one barrel of raw honey and that's when the worker bees at Billybee step in to play their part; with a good-for-you recipe that dates back about 2,000 years, this California bakery produces 50,000 loaves of sprouted wheat bread every day; meet the cookie doctor who invented this checkerboard cookie that combines strawberry and banana in one irresistible shortbread biscuit; and, it takes a team of artisan chocolatiers several hours to expertly transform wrinkly sun-dried Bing cherries into these picture-perfect mouth-watering confections.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: From raw materials to finished products, Food Factory goes behind the scenes to reveal how our favorite foods are produced: Every day, 25 million sunflower seeds are coated with chocolate and emerge as a rainbow of tasty treats; with roots that go back nearly 400 years, this California operation transforms rice into vinegar that packs a karate kick of flavour; a former fencing champion is behind this tangy Thai soup-in-a-bag that's made with love and local produce; and, this L.A. outfit has recruited thousands of bees to help put the gourmet goodness into these chocolate-covered caramels.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Sometimes the trust between pilots and their planes breaks down, and the cockpit inadvertently becomes a struggle that pits man against machine. Eager crowds gather at an air show to watch the new pride of French aviation, but witness a fiery disaster instead. During a routine test flight, one of the world's most advanced planes nosedives into the Mediterranean. And, when a packed Airbus disappears over the Atlantic, investigators face a two-year deep-sea search for answers.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Hindenburg: The New Evidence
programme.desc: Shot by amateur photographer Harold Schenck and never seen by government investigators in 1937, Hindenburg has remained essentially unknown until recently. The stunning footage of the Hindenburg's final moment starts earlier than in the other famous newsreel films – and it was shot from an entirely new angle that shows the entire length and breadth of the eight-hundred-foot-long airship. It's also the only known footage of the Hindenburg in the air before it crashes in flames. A team of crash investigators, historians, and scientists has come together to reexamine the case of the airship Hindenburg with the new film evidence in hand.

programme.title: Lost Cities with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Using cutting edge technology such as ground-penetrating radar, LiDar and 3D scanning, Albert Lin takes us on a journey of discovery to reveal the secrets and mysteries of various archaeological sites. Working alongside on-site archaeologists with expert knowledge of that specific area, Lin explores the hidden worlds and attempts to recreate them for the viewer. Episodes include travelling to Israel in search of the lost treasures of the enigmatic Knights Templar; adventuring in Colombia to look for the lost city of El Dorado; exploring in Micronesia to try to uncover the ancient island city of Nan Madol; and attempting to discover the mysteries behind the buidling of Stonehenge and the previous occupants who inhabited the site before the stones were raised.

programme.title: Lost Cities with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Using cutting edge technology such as ground-penetrating radar, LiDar and 3D scanning, Albert Lin takes us on a journey of discovery to reveal the secrets and mysteries of various archaeological sites. Working alongside on-site archaeologists with expert knowledge of that specific area, Lin explores the hidden worlds and attempts to recreate them for the viewer. programme.title: Latin American Hot Borders
programme.desc: On the border between Colombia and Ecuador a mother and son are detained for attempting to export a big shipment of poor quality bananas. While the mother discusses a financial settlement with the officers, the son escapes with the cargo, leaving the mother in the hands of the authorities. Meanwhile between Brazil and Paraguay customs officers discover a large amount of marijuana in the boot of a car.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: Game Shakers

With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: 44 Cats

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: In Blue's Clues & You, beloved puppy Blue invites viewers to join her and Josh on a clue-led adventure to solve a puzzle. With each paw print, the viewer is inspired to interact with Josh and Blue to figure out Blue's Clues!

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Barbapapa – One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: PAW Patrol is a preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Zuma, Rubble, and Skye, who are led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. With a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles and lots of cute doggy humor, the PAW Patrol works together on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.From Marshall the firedog to Chase the police pup to Skye, who flies high in her copter, each pup brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. They all have special Pup Packs on their backs to help them handle anything – from rescuing kittens to saving a train from a rockslide! And no matter how big the adventure, the PAW Patrol always has time for a game, a laugh, and an ear scratch from Ryder.Fun PAW Patrol Fact: Ryder rescued all the pups and taught them their PAW Patrol skills.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lori takes a waitressing job at Dad's restaurant, but it turns out that serving is harder than she anticipated. Spurred on by a classmate's mocking about Charles, Lana decides to train him to compete in a local dog show.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lucy faces off against her friend Haiku to become the new president of the Young Morticians' Club at school. Leni is promoted to temporary manager at work, but she worries about remaining good friends with Miguel and Fiona.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Eager to be named Kings of the Con at the Ace Savvy convention, Lincoln and Clyde convince the sisters to go with them as the Full Deck. But the girls get more attention, leading the boys to do whatever it takes to gain focus.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Lego City Adventures is an American-Danish computer-animated TV series produced by The Lego Group. The series is set in the noisy sprawling LEGO City metropolis, where its down-to-earth characters live and work. Here you will meet the bravest firemen, the best policemen, the most attentive mayor and LEGO characters from all walks of life. They team up to stop a mysterious criminal, who causes troubles all around. Each LEGO City citizen can feel quite a hero and participate in the most amazing and unbelievable adventures in the city! If you find yourself there, you witness everyday incidents with a happy ending.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln has a plan for introducing himself to a new girl, but when the sisters catch him he has to avoid them. Pop Pop introduces his new girlfriend to the family. She seems great until she starts showing up unannounced.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max Thunderman are 14-year-old twins who share a house, a school, a birthday, and a set of superpowers courtesy of their super-powered parents. Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: The Quads want to pull off a big stunt so that their class will be remembered by future students, but when they find out that the personal legacy they are leaving behind is not great, they have to fix both before it is too late.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tensions run high when Lincoln and Clyde both get an internship at Flip's and compete to win the manager title. When Lincoln sees how tame Pop Pop has gotten in his older age, he takes him out for a day to remember.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Just Add Magic
programme.desc: After the Girls learn more of the book's secret history from an unexpected ally, they cook Mind Peering Peppermints to learn who cursed Grandma. The magic leads to surprises at home, and they come away with more questions than answers.

programme.title: Goldie's Oldies
programme.desc: 14 yr old Goldie's life is turned upside down when her family moves in with her Grandpa Maury and his three 70 something, totally bonkers housemates. Goldie's landed herself the ultimate insta-family!...If she can keep everyone together.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Luna discovers that the high school music club will be axed due to budget cuts, she leads a protest. Desperate to play Lincoln's trash-themed video game, Lana conspires to distract her brother away from the console.

programme.title: The Casagrandes

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: Aktuāli šodien un rīt
programme.desc: 5.epizode. Mazie un vidējie uzņēmumi – kāda ir to nākotne Latvijā? Raidījuma vadītāja Anda Pēkšēna, kurai ir 20 gadu vadības pieredze uzņēmējdarbībā, kopā ar dažādu nozaru ekspertiem un prasmju treneriem sniegs skaidru redzējumu mazo un vidējo uzņēmumu vadītājiem: kā saglabāt biznesu šodien, kā pastāvēt rīt, kā šodien ir jāmaina komunikācijas veids ar patērētāju, kā vadīt komandu, esošās izmaiņas nodokļu segmentā un citi svarīgi jautājumi, kas ir nozīmīgi ikvienam uzņēmējam.

programme.title: Pipars cepās
programme.desc: 9.epizode. Grila sezona uzņem apgriezienus un aizvien vairāk cilvēku plāno nedēļas nogalēs pagatavot ko īpašu. Kas gan var būt kārdinošāks par grilēta ēdiena smaržu, kas virmo gaisā? Ikdienišķa maltīte kļūs par svētkiem, ja to pārvērtīsiet kopīgā grilēšanas pasākumā dārzā, piemājas terasē vai pie dabas krūts.

programme.title: Pielaiko telpu, māju, dārzu
programme.desc: Vērtīgu padomu un ideju raidījums, kurā tiek apskatītas visdažādākās tēmas, kas saistītas ar dzīvokļa, balkona, mājas, piemājas teritorijas un dārza labiekārtošanu, apzaļumošanu, dizainu. Raidījuma mērķis ir iedvesmot un uzrunāt ikvienu, kas vēlas uzlabot dzīves kvalitāti, mudinot uz rīcību.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. Факты, о которых долго молчали наши коллеги-журналисты и независимая оценка событий, изменивших мир; расследования самых сенсационных историй и свежий взгляд на, казалось бы, общеизвестные исторические факты; поиск закономерностей и параллелей в самых невероятных явлениях нашей жизни, новости из всех областей человеческих знаний и загадки потаённых уголков нашего подсознания. Всё, что вас так долго интересовало, и всё, что может коснуться каждого из нас.

programme.title: Парижские тайны
programme.desc: Исторический триллер о загадочных убийствах в самом романтичном городе мира. Париж, конец XIX века. По городу прокатывается серия загадочных убийств в самых известных и культурно значимых местах города: кабаре Мулен Руж, Парижская опера, Эйфелева башня… Смотрите детективный сериал с французским колоритом.

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Пападос-шоу
programme.desc: Юмористическая телепрограмма подарит телезрителям массу эмоций — от восторга до испуга. В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. Камера фиксирует, как реагируют люди разного возраста на унитаз или душевую кабину в лифте, труп на улице или пленника в багажнике машины. Ведущие предлагают повторить пранки, а автор лучшего видео может получить приз от программы.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Самые шокирующие гипотезы" – документальный проект телеканала РЕН ТВ. Мы дадим новые ответы на старые вопросы и зададим свои. Факты, о которых долго молчали наши коллеги-журналисты и независимая оценка событий, изменивших мир; расследования самых сенсационных историй и свежий взгляд на, казалось бы, общеизвестные исторические факты; поиск закономерностей и параллелей в самых невероятных явлениях нашей жизни, новости из всех областей человеческих знаний и загадки потаённых уголков нашего подсознания. Всё, что вас так долго интересовало, и всё, что может коснуться каждого из нас.

programme.title: Когда мы дома
programme.desc: Об эволюции семейных отношений – от начала совместной жизни и до старости. Главные герои – пять украинских семейных пар разного возраста и степени развития отношений, которые не знакомы между собой. События в комедийном сериале разворачиваются в стенах квартир, в которых проживают пары, и построены на коротких историях из семейной жизни.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Персонажами шоу становятся обычные врачи и больные, ГАИшники и нарушители, родители и дети, полицейские и хулиганы, пилоты и стюардессы, офисные работники и даже стриптизёрши.

programme.title: Инспектор Купер
programme.desc: В Арсенале, одном из промышленных районов российской глубинки, живет Алексей Куприянов по прозвищу Купер. Его жизнь меняется после убийства друга — чтобы вести собственное расследование, и капитан Куприянов уходит из оперативного отдела, и становится участковым инспектором. В Арсенале все ему свое, родное: и бывшая жена со своими проблемами, и сын в переходном возрасте, и девушки-красавицы, и местные жители, которые обращаются к нему за помощью, и даже бандиты, терроризирующие городок. Но Купер не из робких, и точно знает, как со всем этим справиться…

programme.title: Гроздья винограда
programme.desc: Это история любви и дружбы, которая начинается в 1953 году и продолжается 30 лет. Она происходит на фоне истории страны, перипетий колхоза, выращивающего виноград, и жизни донской казачьей станицы. Правительство, обеспокоенное процветанием в стране алкоголизма, решает ввести "сухой закон". Но даже этого им кажется ничтожно мало. И тогда верховная власть постановляет: вырубить виноградные плантации, чтобы свести к минимуму производство спиртной продукции. Уничтожаются виноградники, из-за чего страдает не только природа, но и люди. Казаки, которые существовали за счет выращивания фруктов и виноделия, решают противостоять власти и бороться за любимое дело всеми возможными способами.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: Онлайн
programme.desc: Типичную "блондинку" Лену в жизни устраивает абсолютно все: муж, находящийся на заработках в Португалии, все также позволяет тратить ей деньги и уже перестал пытаться тщетно ее контролировать и дал полную свободу действий. Поэтому, не теряя возможностей, все время Лена проводит с пользой и "по-максимуму" — тратит еще больше денег, смотрит еще больше видео, постит еще больше постов, френдит еще больше людей в соц.сетях и еще больше веселит зрителя, так как комичных ситуаций в ее жизни только прибавляется. Бедный ее муж Витя!

programme.title: Инспектор Купер
programme.desc: В Арсенале, одном из промышленных районов российской глубинки, живет Алексей Куприянов по прозвищу Купер. Его жизнь меняется после убийства друга — чтобы вести собственное расследование, и капитан Куприянов уходит из оперативного отдела, и становится участковым инспектором. В Арсенале все ему свое, родное: и бывшая жена со своими проблемами, и сын в переходном возрасте, и девушки-красавицы, и местные жители, которые обращаются к нему за помощью, и даже бандиты, терроризирующие городок. Но Купер не из робких, и точно знает, как со всем этим справиться…

programme.title: Морские дьяволы
programme.desc: В сериале идёт рассказ о работе и взаимоотношениях членов специального подразделения. Его сформировали из лучших обученных бойцов для возможности вести бои во всех трёх ипостасях: на морских, земных и воздушных просторах. Их группа состоит из четвёрки отважных людей, каждый из которой способен работать за всех остальных. Их стали все и повсеместно называть "морскими дьяволами" ведь основные миссии, ставящие перед ними, связаны именно с водной стихией. Пока ещё не было перед ними поставлено такой задачи, которая стала неподвластной этой четвёрке. Каждый из них уникален по-своему и хоть они очень разные, но придерживаются одной цели – всегда с честью подходить к выполнению профессионального долга.

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Смерч. Судьбы
programme.desc: Их называют "морскими дьяволами", хотя по праву их можно считать рыцарями трех стихий: они действуют на земле, в воде и в воздухе. Захватывающий боевик "Морские дьяволы" посвящен спецназовцам ВМФ России, всем боевым пловцам — тем, кто является элитой наших вооруженных сил. Все имена и боевые псевдонимы в сериале вымышлены, отряд под таким названием никогда не существовал, но такие подразделения существуют на самом деле, и их подвигами страна вправе гордиться!

programme.title: Детективы
programme.desc: Два полицейских в отставке открывают частное детективное агентство... Майоры полиции Игорь Лукин и Алексей Насонов вышли в отставку, но не собираются сидеть без дела. Они открывают частное детективное агентство "Детективы" и берутся за дела тех, кто по разным причинам не хочет обращаться в полицию… Опыт и профессиональные навыки Лукина и Насонова позволяют им с одинаковым успехом и решать семейные конфликты, и раскрывать уголовные преступления.

programme.title: Пёс
programme.desc: Макс — алкоголик. Когда-то лучший сыщик в городе, Макс потерял все — работу, друзей, жену. У него остался единственный друг — Пес. После серии погонь, драк и перестрелок, Пес и Макс раскрыли тайну загадочного убийства. Макс с Псом снова стали детективами. Теперь каждый день начинается с того, что Пес и Макс пытаются выяснить, кто совершил преступление… И выяснить — кто из них лучший сыщик в городе!

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Hosted by marine biologist Danni Washington, this is a fascinating STEM series which focuses on the fun and inventive ways that scientists, engineers and inventors have taken inspiration from Mother Nature's methods in order to develop incredible advancements in their fields. By copying the ways that plants and animals have developed, the human innovators can utilise similar approaches to evolve modern technology for everyday use. From advances such as a new type of glass inspired by spider webs that will stop birds from crashing into it; to tiny robots based on manta rays that are helping to fight heart problems; and creating a new type of camera based on the study of squids.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Junior Vets
programme.desc: Six children get the opportunity to see what it is like to be a veterinarian first hand. The kids get to go to the University of Edinburgh to attend within the Royal School Of Veterinary Studies where they get to go into the veterinary hospitals and get involved in the real life cases. In hopes of inspiring the children about veterinary practices the kids get to get hands on in helping the ill animals and are taught how to get them back to health. Going through a range of challenges the children attend events, zoos and wildlife hospitals treating an array of animals. At the end of the series on of the participants will be crowned Head Vet for demonstrating excellent veterinary skills.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Hey You! What If…
programme.desc: Hey You! What If...is a British children's series with a fun approach to get children interested in science. Each episode answers scientific questions, as the main character goes through impossible situations, with madcap experiments created by visual effects and motion graphics. Anything becomes real in this thought-provoking show, as possibilities of time travel, flat Earth and even a moon made of cheese are explored.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Madagascar
programme.desc: Eight British children leave the comfort of the homes to work alongside Madagascar's wildlife conservationists in this life-changing documentary series. Madagascar is a biodiversity hotspot, home to unique plants and animals that face an existential threat due to a growing human population and environmental changes. More than 90% of the island's wildlife is found only on Madagascar, and these eight young volunteers are here to help the passionate conservationists with protecting the remarkable native species. Narrated by Steve Backshall, follow the children as they learn about the incredible animals and extraordinary plants that are in danger of being lost from the planet.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli, MIT Engineer and astronautics expert takes viewers on incredible journeys through space. She visits various NASA facilities, private space companies, and interviews space experts in search of answers about our universe.

programme.title: Fierce Earth
programme.desc: A rumble in the earth, tsunami in the sea, or twister moving in... these catastrophic events in nature have destructive outcomes, and this is the story of the devastation they leave. The Fierce Earth team are here to take a look at some of our planets most powerful forces, why they happen and the results of their occurrence. See shocking footage of avalanches, lighting strikes, wildfires and hurricanes, and learn how you can stay as safe as possible in the event of one of Earths fiercest natural events.

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Hosted by marine biologist Danni Washington, this is a fascinating STEM series which focuses on the fun and inventive ways that scientists, engineers and inventors have taken inspiration from Mother Nature's methods in order to develop incredible advancements in their fields. By copying the ways that plants and animals have developed, the human innovators can utilise similar approaches to evolve modern technology for everyday use. From advances such as a new type of glass inspired by spider webs that will stop birds from crashing into it; to tiny robots based on manta rays that are helping to fight heart problems; and creating a new type of camera based on the study of squids.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: Junior Vets
programme.desc: Six children get the opportunity to see what it is like to be a veterinarian first hand. The kids get to go to the University of Edinburgh to attend within the Royal School Of Veterinary Studies where they get to go into the veterinary hospitals and get involved in the real life cases. In hopes of inspiring the children about veterinary practices the kids get to get hands on in helping the ill animals and are taught how to get them back to health. Going through a range of challenges the children attend events, zoos and wildlife hospitals treating an array of animals. At the end of the series on of the participants will be crowned Head Vet for demonstrating excellent veterinary skills.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Madagascar
programme.desc: Eight British children leave the comfort of the homes to work alongside Madagascar's wildlife conservationists in this life-changing documentary series. Madagascar is a biodiversity hotspot, home to unique plants and animals that face an existential threat due to a growing human population and environmental changes. More than 90% of the island's wildlife is found only on Madagascar, and these eight young volunteers are here to help the passionate conservationists with protecting the remarkable native species. Narrated by Steve Backshall, follow the children as they learn about the incredible animals and extraordinary plants that are in danger of being lost from the planet.

programme.title: Fierce Earth
programme.desc: A rumble in the earth, tsunami in the sea, or twister moving in... these catastrophic events in nature have destructive outcomes, and this is the story of the devastation they leave. The Fierce Earth team are here to take a look at some of our planets most powerful forces, why they happen and the results of their occurrence. See shocking footage of avalanches, lighting strikes, wildfires and hurricanes, and learn how you can stay as safe as possible in the event of one of Earths fiercest natural events.

programme.title: The Mystery Files
programme.desc: A little bit of mystery makes history a lot more fun. Join cousins E.B and Kyla, as they unwrap the clues left for them by the mysterious Great Aunt Hermione and every Mystery File leads to a new adventure! The Sherlockian duo have inherited the mixed-up files of Great Aunt Hermione, explorer extraordinaire. Each file presents three seemingly unrelated objects from the past, and it's up to the gang to figure out how these artifacts connect to who we are and how we live now. Each mystery unravels new discoveries from around the world, like: How has the invention of flight changed the "size" of our world? Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: Xploration Outer Space
programme.desc: Host Emily Calandrelli, MIT Engineer and astronautics expert takes viewers on incredible journeys through space. She visits various NASA facilities, private space companies, and interviews space experts in search of answers about our universe.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Hey You! What If…
programme.desc: Hey You! What If...is a British children's series with a fun approach to get children interested in science. Each episode answers scientific questions, as the main character goes through impossible situations, with madcap experiments created by visual effects and motion graphics. Anything becomes real in this thought-provoking show, as possibilities of time travel, flat Earth and even a moon made of cheese are explored.

programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Hosted by marine biologist Danni Washington, this is a fascinating STEM series which focuses on the fun and inventive ways that scientists, engineers and inventors have taken inspiration from Mother Nature's methods in order to develop incredible advancements in their fields. By copying the ways that plants and animals have developed, the human innovators can utilise similar approaches to evolve modern technology for everyday use. From advances such as a new type of glass inspired by spider webs that will stop birds from crashing into it; to tiny robots based on manta rays that are helping to fight heart problems; and creating a new type of camera based on the study of squids.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Madagascar
programme.desc: Eight British children leave the comfort of the homes to work alongside Madagascar's wildlife conservationists in this life-changing documentary series. Madagascar is a biodiversity hotspot, home to unique plants and animals that face an existential threat due to a growing human population and environmental changes. More than 90% of the island's wildlife is found only on Madagascar, and these eight young volunteers are here to help the passionate conservationists with protecting the remarkable native species. Narrated by Steve Backshall, follow the children as they learn about the incredible animals and extraordinary plants that are in danger of being lost from the planet.

Did the Vikings set foot in North America hundreds of years before any other Europeans? Are the undead real? And how does the way we measure time change the way we live?

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Fierce Earth
programme.desc: A rumble in the earth, tsunami in the sea, or twister moving in... these catastrophic events in nature have destructive outcomes, and this is the story of the devastation they leave. programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

Raidījums "100 recepšu Latvijas simtgadei. Sedas receptes", atk.
В тихом омуте
programme.desc: В идиллически тихом и спокойном городке бесследно пропадает 10-летний мальчик. Всё указывает на то, что повторяются преступления прошлых лет, когда в округе исчезали дети. Назначенный на дело детектив Грег Харпер страдает от размолвки с женой Джеки, которая ему изменила, и после в семье всё пошло наперекосяк. Сын обижен на мать, сам глава семейства всё больше спит на диване, и только Джеки замечает, что в их доме происходят какие-то странности, но никто не хочет её слушать.

programme.title: Гамлет ХХI век
programme.desc: История Гамлета, принца Датского, перенесенная в XXI век. Героям придется решать все те же нравственные проблемы и преодолевать те же трудности, но средствами сегодняшнего дня. Вместо дуэлей на шпагах – гонка, вместо писем – видеопослания, вместо классического саундтрека – композиции Deep Purple.

programme.title: Холодным днем в парке
programme.desc: Она приглашает юношу к себе домой...

programme.title: 3 дня с Роми Шнайдер
programme.desc: 1981 год. Роми Шнайдер – актриса с мировым именем, чья карьера началась в 15 лет, – уединяется в фешенебельном отеле, чтобы избавиться от депрессии. Здесь, поддерживаемая близкой подругой, она дает свое последнее в жизни интервью для журнала "Штерн". Откровенный разговор с амбициозным журналистом раскрывает неожиданные стороны Роми Шнайдер. Эта ослепительная женщина, которую многие уже считали сломленной, оказалась полна страсти и надежд.

programme.title: В тихом омуте
programme.desc: В идиллически тихом и спокойном городке бесследно пропадает 10-летний мальчик. Всё указывает на то, что повторяются преступления прошлых лет, когда в округе исчезали дети. Назначенный на дело детектив Грег Харпер страдает от размолвки с женой Джеки, которая ему изменила, и после в семье всё пошло наперекосяк. Сын обижен на мать, сам глава семейства всё больше спит на диване, и только Джеки замечает, что в их доме происходят какие-то странности, но никто не хочет её слушать.

programme.title: Плохие банки
programme.desc: Карьера Яны не задалась с самого начала – ее уволили из солидного банка Люксембурга за небольшую ошибку. Вскоре девушка получает предложение от Габриэля Фенгера, руководителя крупного банка во Франкфурте. Она довольно быстро зарабатывает себе репутацию отличного специалиста, оказываясь одной из самых ценных сотрудниц банка Deutsche Invest. Но беда в том, что финансовая организация, в которой она работала раньше, конкурирует с нынешней, и девушка оказывается целью шантажа бывшего начальника.

programme.title: Убийства в стиле Гойи
programme.desc: Роберто Аламо, Хинес Гарсия Мильян. Две сыщицы берутся за расследование серии убийств в самом богатом районе Мадрида. Погружаясь в детали, они выясняют, что преступник разыгрывает с жертвами страшный спектакль. На месте преступления маньяк воссоздает сюжеты полотен Франсиско Гойи.

programme.title: Женское дело
programme.desc: Франция, Вторая мировая война. Чтобы как-то свести концы с концами, мать двух детей Мари Латур делает подпольные аборты и сдаёт комнату знакомой проститутке. На вернувшегося с войны из-за ранения домой мужа она не обращает никакого внимания и живёт своей жизнью. Аборты постепенно начинают приносить неплохой доход, а скуку можно легко развеять заведя молодого любовника...

programme.title: Несокрушимый
programme.desc: В основе фильма реальная история уникального подвига экипажа танка "КВ-1". Приняв неравный бой, экипаж Семена Коновалова уничтожил 16 танков, 2 бронемашины и 8 автомашин с живой силой противника в районе хутора Нижнемитякин Тарасовского района Ростовской области. Это история не плакатных героев, а разбитных, веселых, очень разных парней, которые просто хотели жить, но в решающую минуту сумели принять единственно верное решение и совершить подвиг достойный легенды.

programme.title: Бессонная ночь
programme.desc: Винсент — коп, который в ходе операции крадет у бандитов мешок кокаина. Гангстеры решают похитить сына Винсента, чтобы вернуть кокаин. Но к этому моменту герой уже не имеет при себе наркотики. Чтобы спасти своего сына, он должен отложить столько, сколько может, время обмена. Предстоящая ночь, кажется, самая длинная в его жизни и, возможно, даже последняя…

programme.title: Плохие банки
programme.desc: Карьера Яны не задалась с самого начала – ее уволили из солидного банка Люксембурга за небольшую ошибку. Вскоре девушка получает предложение от Габриэля Фенгера, руководителя крупного банка во Франкфурте. Она довольно быстро зарабатывает себе репутацию отличного специалиста, оказываясь одной из самых ценных сотрудниц банка Deutsche Invest. Но беда в том, что финансовая организация, в которой она работала раньше, конкурирует с нынешней, и девушка оказывается целью шантажа бывшего начальника.
